name: SIMPle Game (itch) (kerhab)
description:
Use Left Arrow Key to move left , Right Arrow to Right and Up arrow key to Jump!

Open the gates before the other player got collided and ofc ...DIES!

 SUBMISSION FOR GAMEJAM (MY FIRST GAME JAM SUBMISSION)..

There are massive errors on the game so pls feel free to comment down and rate as you want.

Submission for Wowie Game jam by Jonas Tyroller.
